subquery.from: INNER JOIN SAMPLE SA ON SA.OPERATION_FK = S.STATION_NUMBER AND SA.LABEL LIKE UPPER('SAMPLE#%')
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAMPLE_MEASUREMENT SM ON SM.SAMPLE_FK = SA.ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN PMFM ON PMFM.ID = SM.PMFM_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN QUALITATIVE_VALUE SQV ON SQV.ID=SM.QUALITATIVE_VALUE_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAMPLE CHILD_SA ON CHILD_SA.PARENT_SAMPLE_FK = SA.ID AND CHILD_SA.LABEL LIKE UPPER('INDIVIDUAL_MONITORING#%')
INNER JOIN SAMPLE PARENT_SA ON PARENT_SA.OPERATION_FK = S.STATION_NUMBER AND PARENT_SA.LABEL LIKE UPPER('SAMPLE#%')
INNER JOIN SAMPLE SA ON SA.PARENT_SAMPLE_FK = PARENT_SA.ID AND SA.LABEL LIKE UPPER('INDIVIDUAL_MONITORING#%')
INNER JOIN SAMPLE_MEASUREMENT SM ON SM.SAMPLE_FK = SA.ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN PMFM ON PMFM.ID = SM.PMFM_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN QUALITATIVE_VALUE SQV ON SQV.ID=SM.QUALITATIVE_VALUE_FK

query.select: UPPER('ST')
S.SAMPLING_TYPE
S.LANDING_COUNTRY
S.VESSEL_FLAG_COUNTRY
S.YEAR
S.PROJECT
S.TRIP_CODE
S.STATION_NUMBER
T.ID
COALESCE(TN.LABEL, TG.LABEL)
COALESCE(TN.NAME, TG.NAME)
T.SAMPLE_DATE
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'PICKING_TIME' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'VITALITY_SCORE' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'REFLEX_TAIL_GRAB' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'REFLEX_STARTLE_TOUCH' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'REFLEX_SPIRACLES' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'REFLEX_BODY_FLEX' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'INJURIES_OPEN_WOUNDS' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'INJURIES_HEAD' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'INJURIES_BODY' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'INJURIES_TAIL' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'INJURIES_FIN_DAMAGE' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'SEX' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'LENGTH_TOTAL_CM' THEN T.NUM_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'TAG_ID' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'MONITORING_BOX_ID' THEN T.ALPHA_VALUE END)
T.MONITORING_ID
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'IS_DEAD' THEN (CASE T.NUM_VALUE WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' WHEN 0 THEN 'N' END) END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'DEATH_TIME' THEN TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(REPLACE(T.ALPHA_VALUE, 'T', ' '), 'Z', '')) END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'DEATH_TIME' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(REPLACE(T.ALPHA_VALUE, 'T', ' '), 'Z', ''), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'VERTEBRAL_COLUMN_ANALYSIS' THEN (CASE T.NUM_VALUE WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' WHEN 0 THEN 'N' END) END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'MEASURE_TIME' THEN TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(REPLACE(T.ALPHA_VALUE, 'T', ' '), 'Z', '')) END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'MEASURE_TIME' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(REPLACE(T.ALPHA_VALUE, 'T', ' '), 'Z', ''), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'DO_PCT' THEN T.NUM_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'SAL_PSU' THEN T.NUM_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'WATER_TEMP_C' THEN T.NUM_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'AIR_TEMP_C' THEN T.NUM_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'CLOUD_COVER_PCT' THEN T.NUM_VALUE END)
MAX(CASE T.PMFM_LABEL WHEN 'CLOUD_COVER_PCT' THEN T.NUM_VALUE END)
query.from: INNER JOIN SAMPLE_WITH_MEAS T ON T.STATION_NUMBER = S.STATION_NUMBER
LEFT OUTER JOIN TAXON_NAME TN ON TN.REFERENCE_TAXON_FK = T.REFERENCE_TAXON_FK AND TN.IS_REFERENT=true
LEFT OUTER JOIN TAXON_GROUP TG ON TG.ID = T.TAXON_GROUP_FK
query.groupby: RECORD_TYPE, SAMPLING_TYPE, LANDING_COUNTRY, VESSEL_FLAG_COUNTRY, YEAR, PROJECT, TRIP_CODE, S.STATION_NUMBER, T.ID, SPECIES_CODE, SPECIES_NAME, T.SAMPLE_DATE, T.MONITORING_ID
